sourcesContent:
<script>
import { Line } from "vue-chartjs"

export default {
  extends: Line,
  mounted() {
    fetch("http://localhost:3000/infos/lastMonth")
      .then((res) => {
        return res.json()
      })
      .then((response) => {
        console.log(response)
        let labelsParam = []
        let datasetsParam = [{ data: [] }]

        response.data.total.forEach((element) => {
          labelsParam.push(element.access_date)
          datasetsParam[0].data.push(element.access)
        })
        datasetsParam[0].label = "Total de Usu√°rios"
        datasetsParam[0].tension = 0
        datasetsParam[0].borderColor = ["rgb(0,0,0)"]
        datasetsParam[0].borderWidth = 1
        ;(datasetsParam[0].backgroundColor = ["rgb(1, 154, 242)"]),
          (datasetsParam[0].pointBackgroundColor = "rgb(255,0,0)")
        datasetsParam[0].pointRadius = 2

        this.renderChart(
          {
            labels: labelsParam,
            datasets: datasetsParam,
          },
          {
            responsive: true,
            maintainAspectRatio: false,
            order: 1,
            borderCapStyle: "butt",
            fill: false,
            title: {
              display: true,
            },
          }
        )

        // this.renderChart(
        //   {
        //     labels: [
        //       "January",
        //       "February",
        //       "March",
        //       "April",
        //       "May",
        //       "June",
        //       "July",
        //     ],
        //     datasets: [
        //       {
        //         label: "Data 1",
        //         data: [2, 10, 5, 9, 0, 6, 20],
        //         backgroundColor: "transparent",
        //         borderColor: "rgba(1, 116, 188, 0.50)",
        //         pointBackgroundColor: "rgba(171, 71, 188, 1)",
        //       },
        //     ],
        //   },
        //   {
        //     responsive: true,
        //     maintainAspectRatio: false,
        //     title: {
        //       display: true,
        //       text: "My Data",
        //     },
        //   }
        // )
      })
  },
}
</script>
